ArgumentCompleterAttribute.description: Allows you to add tab completion values to a specific parameter by writing a script block that generates zero or more CompletionResult objects. More: Get-Help about_Functions_Argument_Completion

Calculated Property.description: Typically used with Select-Object or Sort-Object. More: Get-Help about_Calculated_Properties

Class.description: A blueprint used to create instances of objects at run time. More: Get-Help about_Classes

Class Constructor.description: Set default values and validate object logic at the moment of creating the instance of the class. Constructors have the same name as the class. Constructors might have arguments, to initialize the data members of the new object. More: Get-Help about_Classes

Class Method.description: Defines the actions that a class can perform. Methods may take parameters that provide input data. Methods can return output. Data returned by a method can be any defined data type. More: Get-Help about_Classes

Class Property.description: Properties are variables declared at class scope. A property may be of any built-in type or an instance of another class. Classes have no restriction in the number of properties they have. More: Get-Help about_Classes

do-until.description: Runs a statement list repeatedly until a condition is met. More: Get-Help about_Do
body: ${1:<# Condition that stops the loop if it returns true #>}

do-while.description: Runs a statement list repeatedly as long as a condition is met. More: Get-Help about_Do
body: ${1:<# Condition that stops the loop if it returns false #>}

else.description: else defines what is done when all if and elseif conditions are false. More: Get-Help about_If

elseif.description: elseif provides an alternative path when an if condition is false. More: Get-Help about_If

Enum.description: An enumeration is a distinct type that consists of a set of named labels called the enumerator list. More: Get-Help about_Enum

for.description: Creates a loop that runs commands in a command block while a specified condition evaluates to $true.

foreach.description: Iterate through a collection assigning a variable to the current item on each loop rather than using $PSItem. More: Get-Help about_Foreach

function.description: A simple function with a parameter block to specify function arguments. More: Get-Help about_Functions

Function Help.description: Comment-based help for an advanced function. More: Get-Help about_Comment_Based_Help

if.description: Run code blocks if a specified conditional test evaluates to true.

param-block.description: Declares script parameters with optional attributes.

try-catch.description: Attempt a block of code and handle exceptions.

try-finally.description: Ensures cleanup logic always runs after the protected block.

while.description: Repeatedly perform an action while a condition is true.

switch.description: Evaluates a value against multiple conditions.

PSCustomObject.description: Creates a structured record in one go.

write-host.description: Writes colorized output to the console.
